Wellington City Council clarifies plans to allow mosques to broadcast call to prayer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-city-council-clarizes-plans-to-allow-mosques-to-broadcast-call-to-prayer/GF5GFQVW5VEA5E7QGK6QZYMV3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-city-council-clarizes-plans-to-allow-mosques-to-broadcast-call-to-prayer/GF5GFQVW5VEA5E7QGK6QZYMV3Q/ Azaria HowellOne broadcast would be on the anniversary of the Christchurch mosque attacks. Mon, 09 Sep 2024 02:24:25 +0000 A Wellington City Council agenda confirms Kilbirnie Mosque plans to broadcast the call to prayer three times a year.
Four-week-old baby stopped breathing after being given 5 times the prescribed dose of steroid https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/four-week-old-baby-stopped-breathing-after-being-given-5-times-the-prescribed-dose-of-steroid/YUI77ZTW65CIPJ6YEHKDYWGFNU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/four-week-old-baby-stopped-breathing-after-being-given-5-times-the-prescribed-dose-of-steroid/YUI77ZTW65CIPJ6YEHKDYWGFNU/ Hannah BartlettThe pharmacist made the medicine five times stronger than it should have been. Mon, 09 Sep 2024 02:05:08 +0000 A mother was provided with the wrong dose of steroid to give to her four-week-old baby - a dose that was five times higher than it should have been. Photo / 123 RF

One person dead in quad bike accident at Cust, North Canterbury https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/one-person-dead-in-quad-bike-accident-at-waimakariri-canterbury/QFHSP3JEOZBW3G4QGEV5EEBLPU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/one-person-dead-in-quad-bike-accident-at-waimakariri-canterbury/QFHSP3JEOZBW3G4QGEV5EEBLPU/ Inquiries are ongoing, and the death will be referred to the Coroner. Mon, 09 Sep 2024 00:50:43 +0000 One person died in a Canterbury quad-bike accident last night.

Grey Lynn shooting: Teenager appears in court charged with murdering Maxwel-Dee Repia, along with alleged accomplice after-the-fact https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/grey-lynn-shooting-teenager-to-appear-in-court-charged-with-murdering-maxwel-dee-repia-along-with-alleged-accomplice-事后/SR4IITI33BBKDPFAKYDDWWKABA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/grey-lynn-shooting-teenager-to-appear-in-court-charged-with-murdering-maxwel-dee-repia-along-with-alleged-accomplice-事后/SR4IITI33BBKDPFAKYDDWWKABA/ George BlockIt emerged in court that police are yet to find the firearm allegedly used to kill Repia. Mon, 09 Sep 2024 00:16:46 +0000 A 19-year-old Auckland man appears in the Auckland District Court charged with killing Maxwel-Dee Repia in Grey Lynn on Thursday, September 5, and wounding several others. Photo / NZME
Wellington off-duty police officer caught in public sex act at train station carpark https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-off-duty-police-officer-caught-in-public-sex-act-at-train-station-carpark/XLTOYJS5XZDCVMHYEU3UAH3T2Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-off-duty-police-officer-caught-in-public-sex-act-at-train-station-carpark/XLTOYJS5XZDCVMHYEU3UAH3T2Q/ Jaime LythThe pair admitted sex took place in the car but thought no one could see them.
